title: The One Piece Podcast - Buggy Buggy Boo
author: The One Piece Podcast
description: The One Piece Podcast's coverage of Episode 423, discussing Luffy's infiltration of Impel Down and his reunion with Buggy the Clown.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for early Impel Down arc events

title: The One Piece Virgin - IMPEL DOWN! (Chapters 525-549)
author: The One Piece Virgin featuring Animak, Tekking101, Briggs, and Nux Taku
description: Episode 26 covering Chapters 525-549 of the One Piece Manga and the Impel Down Arc of the story, featuring multiple One Piece content creators.

title: LUFFY TEAMS UP WITH THE GOAT!! - One Piece Episode 422 & 423 REACTION + REVIEW!
author: Unknown Reactor
description: Reaction and review video covering Episodes 422 and 423, focusing on Luffy's infiltration of Impel Down and his reunion with Buggy.

title: BUGGY IS BACK?!?! | One Piece Episode 423 Couples Reaction & Discussion
author: Unknown Reactor
description: Couples reaction and discussion video for Episode 423, featuring reactions to Buggy's return and the Luffy-Buggy reunion.

title: BUGGY IS BACK!!! | ONE PIECE Ep 422-423 REACTION
author: Unknown Reactor
description: Reaction video covering Episodes 422-423 of One Piece, highlighting Buggy's return in Impel Down.

title: One Piece – Impel Down Arc (Episodes 422 – 456) Review
author: Hogan Reviews
description: Comprehensive review of the entire Impel Down arc, covering Episodes 422-456. The reviewer describes it as amazingly written and constructed, clearly one of the best arcs in the series.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Impel Down arc

title: 422-423: 'A Deadly Infiltration! The Underwater Prison Impel Down!' and 'A Reunion in Hell?! The Man Who Ate the Chop-Chop Fruit!'
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: First-time watcher's reaction and analysis of Episodes 422-423. Describes Impel Down as a mash-up between the Eternal Prison from Blood Omen 2 and Dante's Inferno with its multiple layers of cruelty.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: First-time watcher perspective, no future spoilers
